Articles.Content:
A lightweight and small wingsuit with twin .50 cal machine guns and 15 minutes of fuel.

[TABLE=class: grid, width: 500]

[TR]

[TD]Name:[/TD]

[TD]Draco Weaponized Light Wingsuit[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Max Speed:[/TD]

[TD]260 m/s below 1000 meters[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Max Altitude:[/TD]

[TD]10000 m, not tested above this[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Armament:[/TD]

[TD]2x Twin .50 cal Machine Gun Turrets[/TD]

[/TR]

[/TABLE]

Javascript is disabled. View full album

This wingsuit is great for taking down enemy fighters, and holds one kerbal. Powered by twin Juno engines, she has 100 liters of fuel and 15 minutes of flight time. Also equipped with a parachute for survivable landings, it can drop behind enemy lines(version shown in the album has no parachute). In flight, she turns very well. However, make sure to use control from here on the probe core for best results.

Download Link:http://www./download/wlh1qz5ybglw4rl/Draco_Wingsuit.craft

Edited November 15, 2015 by Alphasus
